author: Shariq Khan
title: Everyone wants laptop, keyboard as lockdown extends
description: Everyone wants laptop, keyboard as lockdown extendsThe nationwide lockdown led to the rise of a new work culture - work from home (WFH) and with that the dash and scramble to get everything from a keyboard, to a mouse to a laptop. Unfortunately, supply is sev…
content: A visible bi-product of the nationwide lockdown has been a marked spike in the demand of IT peripherals required by customers and companies alike. Right before the days prior to the Janta Curfew announcement, customers were seen standing in long queues outsid… [+7253 chars]
